 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּם‎</span> **verb** ==be drowsy, slumber== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְנֵם‎</span> ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נוּם‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָמ֫וּ‎</span> [[Nah.3.18|Nah 3:18]]; [[Ps.76.6|Ps 76:6]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72»§ 72</sup> ***l***); ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנוּם‎</span> [[Ps.121.3|Ps 121:3]] + 2 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּ֫נָם‎</span> [[2Sam.4.6|2Sam 4:6]] (so read for HCT <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּכֻּהו‎</span>, with other radical changes, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָנוּם‎</span> [[Isa.56.10|Isa 56:10]]. — ***be drowsy, slumber***, literal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּנָם וַתִּישָׁ֑ן‎</span> [[2Sam.4.6|2Sam 4:6]] (emendation, see above) ***and she grew drowsy and slept***; figurative of inactivity, indolence, [[Isa.5.27|Isa 5:27]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ישׁן‎</span>), [[Ps.121.3|Ps 121:3]]; [[Ps.121.4|Ps 121:4]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; \|\| ***id.***); [[Nah.3.18|Nah 3:18]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכֵן‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹהֲבֵי לָנ‎</span> [[Isa.56.10|Isa 56:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכַב‎</span>); followed by accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁנָה‎</span> [[Ps.76.6|Ps 76:6]] (of death, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְדַּם‎</span>).
